title: Checkout.com Suffers Data Breach as ShinyHunters Attack Cloud Storage

content.raw: Payment processor Checkout.com recently experienced a data breach after being targeted by the cybercrime group “ShinyHunters.” The attackers accessed old data stored in a third-party cloud system. Luckily, Checkout.com’s live payment processing environment was not affected, and no merchant funds or card numbers were accessed. The company revealed that the breach happened last week when […] The post Checkout.com Suffers Data Breach as ShinyHunters Attack Cloud Storage appeared first on GBHackers Security | #1 Globally Trusted Cyber Security News Platform.
